Network PrintersÂ¶

Getting the printer object:

from escpos.connections import getNetworkPrinter


printer = getNetworkPrinter()(host='192.168.0.20', port=9100)

printer.text("Hello World")
printer.lf()

Connecting to escpos printer on a network is ridiculously simple. Just provide the IP address and port(default 9100 mostly works) and you are set!
